body.name: 3 Tier Bamboo Shoe Rack for Closet Free Standing Wood Shoe Shelf Storage Organizer for Entryway Small Space Stackable 27"x11"x20" (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 26 mins
features: 【Preferred high-quality bamboo】The entryway shoe rack is made of eco-friendly bamboo for an elegant look and very durable. After high temperature carbonization,not easy to crack and deform. Due to the properties of bamboo, bamboo boards are stronger and last longer than wood. In addition, bamboo is a renewable resource and is naturally environmentally friendly.

【Stackable Design 】Each type of outdoor shoe rack is stackable, and the combinations are constantly changing. Two 2-tier shoe rack units can be stacked into a 4-tier shoe rack, and three 2-tier shoe rack units can be stacked into a 6-tier shoe rack. You can determine the height of the modular shoe rack yourself.

【Easy to Assemble】We offer all the accessories you need for a closet shoe rack. You can assemble this shelf in just a few simple steps. Assembly instructions are very easy to follow.You can install it in only 10 minutes.

【Multifunctional Storage Rack】This cute kids shoe racks keeps your shoes organized.Natural bamboo texture is suitable for almost any home decoration.Also, this floor shoe rack has multiple uses to help you organize everyday items in your bathroom, living room, office, kitchen, such as toiletries, towels, clutter, decorations, books, plants, shoes and small appliances. It maximizes space, simplifies organization, and maintains an uncluttered environment.

【Satisfactory After-sales】If you encounter problems during installation and use, or any dissatisfaction with the mens shoe rack, please feel free to contact us, we can provide professional guidance at any time. If there are quality problems after receiving the goods, we can accept the return and exchange unconditionally after we confirm.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Choose ROMGUAR CRAFT Bamboo Shoe Rack To Meet Your Various Need! We advocate the use of renewable resource materials, protect the global environment, and protect forest resources. This bamboo shoe rack is made of thick material, versatile and can be integrated into a variety of scenes.

In the Bathroom This storage shelf makes it easy to organize your bathroom,Put towels and toiletries, etc.so that the bathroom corner is neat and tidy. In the Kitchen This kitchen shelf can hold condiments, cutlery, sundries,etc, giving you a good cooking atmosphere. In the Balcony When this small shoe rack is placed on the balcony, it turns into a flower stand for placing flowers, vegetables, flower pots, and decorating your life.

In the Office You can put the bamboo shoe rack in the office as a bookshelf to organize books, tea sets, school supplies, etc. In the Bedroom A multifunctional shoe rack is placed beside the bed in the bedroom, which can store and organize blankets, items, accessories, shoes, etc., and also provide you with a warm harbor. In the Entryway This entryway shoe rack can help organize your shoes and bags, keep your entryway clean and make your home looking beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice sturdy rack for my shoes. It looks great, was easy to setup, and holds 6 pairs of shoes with an additional 3 underneath on the floor. Great price as well, would definitely recommend if you're looking to organize your shoes in an aestheticly pleasing way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We’ll made product
reviews.reviewText: Nice design, easy to assemble, well made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars sturdy and looks good
reviews.reviewText: it’s sturdy and looks good, especially for the price. it holds my boyfriends size 14 shoes well (bottom shelf). and i would buy again!my only “complaints:”it was kinda difficult to put together in the strength aspect for me. the screws do take some work BUT I have weak hands/wrists. other than that it’s really straightforward and it took me maybe 15 mins.also the first picture shows how the wood was splintering a little bit. i pulled the big ones like the piece in my hand off and they weren’t noticeable anymore. the top part came like that but isn’t super noticeable unless you’re close.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assemble. Very solid!
reviews.reviewText: Looks great! Easy to assemble! Great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Look nice,stable,enough space for shoes I need, but it’s stackable,if I need more,then still can do it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a rack that could hold LOTS of shoes, and studied quite a few offerings before settling on this one. The 5 shelves give plenty of space, plus there is room underneath for another row of shoes. The overall size is great -- not too big and not too small. I like that it just sits there doing its job without being a focal point in any way. (After all, who needs to draw attention to their giant pile of shoes at the door?) It is lightweight wood, so there's no climbing on it... but it's perfect for my purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nicely finished material/appearance. Assembly problematic due to poor quality control
reviews.reviewText: This is a sturdy, nice looking 2 rack shelf. The folding shelf is a good idea and makes for a strong joint. when it is opened up. But the leg screw holes weren't properly aligned in some areas and most were too shallow to get the screws in all the way with the tiny tool provided. I did not have any screwdriver tips that would fit (and they are not hex screws either).So, I could return it, re-drill the holes that weren't right and were too shallow, or use my own screws so I could use my drill to power them into the existing holes. I liked the look of the piece so I opted to do the last option and it worked out fine.I took off a star in my rating because of the poor quality control, but only one because I could do a simple work around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what its supposed to
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to assemble, looks good and is the perfect size for three shoes on each shelf.
